programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parent's house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git 'er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car. Violent outbursts plague an arrest. One woman struggles with bail. Three drunk men become wildly emotional.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for an open container of beer. In Salt Lake City, UT a woman is stunned as to how drug paraphernalia wound up on her person. In Las Vegas, NV a former bus driver relays sad details about his past. In Portland, OR a shoplifter receives some sage of wisdom from one of the officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Vice Officers pose as drug dealers in an illegal drug transaction. A man is pulled over and arrested for driving a stolen vehicle. Three men are caught robbing a coin machine.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E20 Now It's Lawn Furniture
programme.desc: A traffic stop over a broken brake light turns into a foot chase. A man handles bad news by throwing his furniture out of the window. A vehicle pursuit ends with a K-9 unit’s help.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E16 Being Honest Goes Along Way
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call which escalates to car chase and the eventual arrest of two suspects. Officers spot a known drug dealer who uses a troubling method to conceal his narcotics. An officer curbs a heckler outside a popular bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E31 Bruised But Not Broken
programme.desc: Deputies assist an injured woman who vows revenge on her male attackers. A woman tells Deputies her husband beat her in front of their children. Officers protect an elderly woman from an abusive child.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E20 A Bag, a Bus and a Break In
programme.desc: A couple calls for help when a man breaks into their home. A school bus is involved in a hit and run accident. Officer find a one gallon bag of contraband in a suspect’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A normal traffic stop turns into an off-road race through a residential neighborhood. Police find a runaway suspect taking refuge in a family member’s closet. A domestic dispute erupts over chips and dip.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers conduct a sting using a decoy vehicle. A man with a knife flees the scene of a dispute with his baby mama. Deputies are dispatched when a man is assaulted with a shovel over twenty dollars.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a restaurant after the owner is held at gunpoint. Police respond to a woman being sexually harassed in a park. A drunk man tells police he is going to buy a lighthouse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man can bail on child support payments, but can’t escape the police. One woman’s retaliation almost gets her girlfriend run over. A sluggish suspect denies the pile of marijuana in his car is his.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Agents of the US Customs and Border Protection pursue a vehicle. Border agents spot two undocumented people while scanning train tracks. Airport Customs detains a man when agents suspect he might be carrying more than luggage.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate a fiasco at a fast food restaurant. A routine pullover results in a drug possession arrest. A vehicular pursuit results in an ill fated foot chase, the suspect is taken to jail for an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from police claiming he heard a gunshot. A woman lays the blame on her boyfriend. Officers confront a man who refuses to come down from a roof.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A cyclist gets booked for trying to split when officers pull him over for a traffic violation. Two brothers struggle to explain why they took off in their truck when they saw the cops. A man takes a swing at his sister because she refuses to mow the lawn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect has a change of heart after he leads police on a pursuit. An Officer discovers sterile syringes and rocks in a suspicious man’s pocket after he is stopped and searched. A woman is arrested for stealing C.D's out of a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E19 One for the Road
programme.desc: A man crashes his vehicle after losing control while attempting to evade the police. An elderly woman with an outstanding DUI warrant is arrested for hit and run. Officers discover methamphetamine while investigating two suspicious vehicles on the side of the road.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police arrest a bicycling dealer and his client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer spots a gun in a vehicle during a routine traffic stop, but the passengers are denying ownership. An intoxicated woman assaults her step-father with a butter knife after he refuses to take her to the hospital for spider bites. A man denies vandalizing a building even though there's evidence on his fingers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E01 Young and the Restless
programme.desc: Officers arrest a man suspected of robbery. A riot erupts at a juvenile party on the beach. Officers find an intoxicated man stuck on an iron fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: US Marshals are tasked with finding a young boy that has been kidnapped for ransom. A man suspected of dealing contraband is reported by his ex-girlfriends mother. Officers raid a home looking for a dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers observe a man trying to pick up a hidden stash of narcotics. Occupants of suspicious vehicles have outstanding warrants. A domestic battery is investigated and justice is served.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A bicyclist is charged with possession and public intoxication. A man is pulled over for expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. A woman spots an intoxicated prowler in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers apprehend a man in possession of stolen property brandishing a rifle. Officers respond to a call of brothers in a fist fight. Police intervene when a couple argues in the middle of the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E08 You Had Me Fooled
programme.desc: An Officer goes undercover as a prostitute. A woman finds a snake in her home. A man solicits himself to an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Three men are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at an apartment complex. An officer discovers a teenager is dating an older man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E01 UC Drug Sting I
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A traffic stop becomes dangerous when the suspect takes off on the interstate. Officers find a large bag of drugs in a man’s pants. Officers respond to a dispute at a familiar location.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect ditches his bike then tries to outrun the police. Neighbors fight about a road rage incident using rocks and a baseball bat. Suspects in a stopped car attempt to hide all the evidence against them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are dispatched to an apartment complex where a young girl may have been a victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Sally James' Bubblegum Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sally James' Bubblegum Pop!
programme.desc: Today we'd call it Cheesy Pop! Back then it was Bubblegum Pop & TISWAS Sally has a prime selection including David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Lynsey De Paul, Tony Orlando & The Osmonds.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Who Had The Most Hits In The 70s?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Had The Most Hits In The 70s?
programme.desc: Our special countdown of the 30 acts with the most UK Top Ten Hits in the 1970s features legends like Bowie, Queen, Abba, Bee Gees, Elton and more. But the No.1 will surprise you!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.desc: 2 hours of funny videos, silly songs & novelty hits - all of them amazing and all in the best possible taste!

programme.title: Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: In year order - the 70 biggest party tunes of the 70s! Every one of them a chart topper.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Kiki Dee's Duos & Duets! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kiki Dee's Duos & Duets! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Two is better than one... good things come in pairs... you get the idea! Here's a 70s icon with some more 70s icons - both duos & some killer collaborations!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Rosko's Hellraisers! Top 25
programme.desc: The biggest rock n roll rebels of the 1970s, presented by the man who was there â that groovy host from the west coast â Radio 1 legend Rosko!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.desc: 2 hours of funny videos, silly songs & novelty hits - all of them amazing and all in the best possible taste!

programme.title: Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Party No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: In year order - the 70 biggest party tunes of the 70s! Every one of them a chart topper.

programme.title: Karaoke For The Kids! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Karaoke For The Kids! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Whether you've kids or you were a kid in the 70s yourself - these are the 50 biggest singalong classics of the decade - in order!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop Reloaded!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop Reloaded!
programme.desc: The ever-smooth Simes dusts off his flares, fires up the lava lamp & takes you on a psychedelic spin through the 70s. Side effects may include sudden urges to perm your hair!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Flares & Floorfillers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Mmm, sniff that heady waft of Brut mixed with cheap perfume as you hit a dancefloor for our playlist of top bops in your cheesecloth shirt or nylon blouse. Make mine a Babycham!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: Tony's Halloween Glam Slam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Tony's Halloween Glam Slam!
programme.desc: Outrageous outfits & make-up, perfect for Halloween - these were the guys & gals that set the style of the 70s - and our man with the musical plan Tony Blackburn was there!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jeepers Creepers! It's the 70s
programme.desc: As the dark nights close in and Halloween approaches - we bring you the fabulously frightful fashions & super scary songs of the 70s!

programme.title: The Hit Songs of Grease!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Hit Songs of Grease!
programme.desc: All 7 music videos & the theme song from the 1978 movie in order - you know the story, and we're all hopelessly devoted to the tunes! They'll go by like Greased Lightnin'!

programme.title: 1978 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1978!

programme.title: The 50s Revival! Top 25
programme.desc: They say music goes in cycles - well for a period in the 70s we decided to celebrate all things 50s! Showaddywaddy's Dave Bartram has hits from Alvin Stardust, Mud, Darts & Grease!

programme.title: 1977 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1977!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1977
programme.desc: If you thought 1977 was all about punk - you might want to think again! Simon Bates brings you a Silver Jubilee year full of pop, soul, disco, country, love & a little bit of rock!

programme.title: Stingray Remember the '80s
programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.desc: Escaping to the sandy solitudes of Hawaii's tropical beaches.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: Motorsport.tv
programme.desc: Welcome to Motorsport.tv! Your home for all the best motor racing content, both live and on demand. We cover races from around the world, from four wheels and two wheels.

programme.title: Gordon Bennett Cup 2024 - Münster (GER)
programme.desc: The Coupe Aéronautique Gordon Bennett, the FAI long-distance world championship for gas balloon pilots, is the oldest and most prestigious event in aviation and the ultimate challenge for pilots. Goal is to cover the greatest distance to the launch site without stopping

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier Xtreme gave birth to the Freeride World Tour, the Freeride World Qualifiers and the Freeride Junior Tour and sparked an international wave of competitive freeriding.

programme.title: The legend of Muksu river - Tajikistan
programme.desc: This is a journey to the Silk Road in Central Asia into the adventurous world of canoeing. The Muksu in Tajikistan is one of the three most difficult rapids here. Once immersed in the river, there is no turning back.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Portimão, Portugal, welcomed the world's best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors.

programme.title: Episode 41
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 41

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: 10 Years Laax Open
programme.desc: The Laax Open is one of the most prestigious snowboard events, celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. Against the backdrop of the Swiss Alps, the Laax Open offers a unique blend of energetic sport and lively après-ski culture.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Monster Energy Supercross Geneva
programme.desc: The Monster Energy Supercross Geneva, a must-attend event at the end of the year, brings together several international riders on one of the largest indoor tracks in Europe. As a major sporting event in Switzerland, it has welcomed around 30,000 spectators in almost 35 editions.

programme.title: Coldwater Classic Series 2010 - Documentary
programme.desc: The Cold Water Classic events feature $15,000 for the winner of each event and $50,000 for the series winner. The Cold Water Classic is the first series of its kind and takes place in some of the world's rougher surf spots.

programme.title: Trans Hong Kong - A Urban MTB Adventure (HKG)
programme.desc: The urban mountain bike adventure series combines rides in some of the world's largest cities. In this episode we cycle through the Hong Kong region with none other than Hans “no way” Rey, the grandfather of mountain bike freeriding.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #48: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #49: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #50: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #51: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Portimão, Portugal, welcomed the world's best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2025 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: The Trans Madeira combines the best that Madeira Island and Porto Santo have to offer with six days of racing in the most diverse terrain in the world! With the addition of a new island, you can expect 250km of riding and more than 30 special stages

programme.title: 2025 WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Cheile Grădiștei Round
programme.desc: The WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup 2025 - Cheile Grădiștei Round marks the exciting start to the season of the world's leading e-mountain bike series. Riders from all over the world will be battling for the first points in the championship standings

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships Round 1 - Axamer Lizum (AUT)
programme.desc: The Downhill Skateboarding World Championships in Axamer Lizum, Austria, kicked off the 2025 season from June 13 to 15. The course on the steep and technically demanding 3.3 km Hoadlstraße featured tight hairpin turns, long straights, and gradients of up to 21.8%, providing ideal conditions for high-speed racing and overtaking maneuvers.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: 10 Years Laax Open
programme.desc: The Laax Open is one of the most prestigious snowboard events, celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. Against the backdrop of the Swiss Alps, the Laax Open offers a unique blend of energetic sport and lively après-ski culture.

programme.title: Episode 41
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 41

programme.title: WOF 2024 #33: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #12: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: New to the line-up this year, veteran Storm Show producer Darrell Miller has teamed up with Full Room Productions’ Ryan Halverson, bringing you more hard-hitting, action-packed, gnar-shredding from the Jackson Hole backcountry.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Kayaking Kerala - Part 1
programme.desc: An international team of kayaking world champions and experienced expeditionists have set out to conquer the wild waters of Kerala. Hardly any other region in the world offers such a wide variety of powerful rapids and waterfalls.

programme.title: Kayaking Kerala - Part 2
programme.desc: An international team of kayaking world champions and experienced expeditionists have set out to conquer the wild waters of Kerala. Hardly any other region in the world offers such a variety of rapids and waterfalls.

programme.title: Nyami Nyami - Slacklining at the Victoria Falls
programme.desc: Two renowned highlining athletes, Reinhard Kleindl (AUT) and Lukas Irmler (GER), realized one of the longest highlines in Africa and the southern hemisphere at the world-famous Victoria Falls!

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #19: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: iQFOiL U23 World Championships - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Portimão, Portugal, welcomed the world's best windsurfers to the iQFOiL U23 World Championships from September 6 to 13, 2025. The venue is known for its Atlantic winds, waves, and extreme racing conditions that challenge even the most experienced competitors

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
